channel.title: Comments on: Testing the Not-So-Testable HttpWebResponse
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description:
Glad it was useful! :)
One thing to note is that I didn't implement all the properties and headers, only the ones I needed at the time. If you run into additional ones you need, feel free to add them (and send me the changes or do a PR) or ask and I'll see if I can add them in. I'm actually using this for another project somewhere and may have some additional options that I never committed to this main repo, I'll have to check.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Adam W
item.dc:creator: Adam W
item.description: Dude! That's so awesome! I snaffled your GitHub code, I couldn't get the async stuff mocked, banging my head on a wall... then your code just works, beautiful! Really appreciate it. Awesome! :D
